channel.title: How do i make myself an admin on my own server?
channel.description: i just started a new server but i dont know how to change it form 0.0.0.0 as ip or make myself an admin, plz help

item.title: How do i make myself an admin on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

ok, put 3 there, then go in tut section and look up a tut so you can see ur own crown =) or just put a 2 there then change all the commands in your client java that require lvl 3 right to 2

item.title: How do i make myself an admin on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

You can’t be logged on while your making your self a admin / owner.
You have to log out, change the rights, save it, then log in.

item.title: How do i make myself an admin on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

You can’t see your crown, but others can.
Watch type a Admin only command, such as ::pickup 0995 1000
If you end up with 1k in your inve, that means your owner.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make myself an admin on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

Go to your Charector .Java file.

Look for your name, then double click on it.

Scroll down a bit and there should be something like this.

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2744
character-posy = 3468
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 5.173.63.41
character-lastlogin = 20060101
character-energy = 74
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 4491

Change the rights to whatever you want.
0 = Normal Player.
1 = Mod.
2 = Admin.
3 = Owner.
4 = Secret Admin. ( Admin rights, but players can’t see your crown. )

Hope i helped
~Ashley.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself an admin on my own server?

item.title: How do i make myself an admin on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

GahZerZ 0.0.0.0 isnt your ip… its t3h server it says starting server on 0.0.0.0.43594 or 5555 ect that means nothing he last 5 or 4 digets are your server port… your ip comes if you have hamachi or no-ip if its no ip it will be

servername.no-ip.org ext and if tis ham itll be somthing like 5.555.555.555 xD

metal

oh and to make yourself admin go into your character file and change where it says playerRights = 0 to playerRights = 3 (3 being owner, 2 admin, 1 mod)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself an admin on my own server?

item.title: How do i make myself an admin on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

to make yourself admin search for this

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

under it you will cee soemthing like this

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURNAMEHERE”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAMEOFYOURADMINHERE”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAMEOFYOURMODHERE”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;

if(playerId == -1) out.write(7);// “This world is full.”
else out.write(returnCode);// login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban
if (playerRights == 3) {
out.write(2); //Crown fixup
} else {
out.write(playerRights);// mod level
}[/code]
now replace YOURNAMEHERE, NAMEOFYOURADMINHERE, NAMEOFYOURMODHERE to the name of teh person you want to be mod

Read full topic
